column4: DearAll I have a rather serious problem, having spent my two days and still unable to solve :(

I have problem in feisty fawn fresh installation. I am attempting installation on Dell D 505.  Problem is that where as I had perfect Display in 6.06 and 6.10, the new release is not centring my screen I cannot see task bar at bottom and at top there is some not usable empty space.
ah it's probably using centered mode w/ a lower resolution.  you need to use the maximum resolution
